item.title: Kiyo - AI Browser Extension
item.description: A chromium extensions which summarizes the text highlighted in your browser via AI. Build with JS, Python and AWS

item.title: Unreally - Fighting Fake News
item.description: An ecosystem to fight fake news on social media and beyond

item.title: Caspar Pagel
item.description: üìç Hamburg, Germany Hello, world! My name is Caspar, aka CasCodes. I’m 17 years old. Currently, I focus on Python to learn more about AI, in particular NLP (natural language processing). Teaching computers how to understand and generate human language is a fascinating field that has the potential to progress almost every industry. In the future, I hope to solve meaningful problems with smart software. Certificates üíª CS50 - Introduction to computer science An online course provided by HarvardX over 12 weeks, including: Programmig with C (Pointers, Memory Allocation, Linked Lists & Hash Tables) | Programming with Python (Flask, AJAX) | SQL | Web (JS, HTML, CSS) |
